trans-unit.target: TEXT_DUNGEONOMEGA_00000_CID_000_000<tab>(-Cid-)<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, do you hear me? Your opponent is called Alte Roite─no idea what the name means, but good luck!
TEXT_DUNGEONOMEGA_00000_NERO_000_010<tab>(-Nero-)Ah, there it is. Catastrophe─a fitting name for the havoc it will doubtless wreak. Have fun, now!
TEXT_DUNGEONOMEGA_00000_HALICARNASSUS_000_020<tab>What fools are these who have entered my domain? No matter. You shall remain here for my pleasure.
TEXT_DUNGEONOMEGA_00000_EXDEATH_000_030<tab>Finally, it is in my grasp! The power to control all creation! The power of the void!
TEXT_DUNGEONOMEGA_00000_EXDEATH_000_031<tab>Why!? The void was mine to command!
TEXT_DUNGEONOMEGA_00000_CID_000_100<tab>(-Cid-)<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, we've located the correct data! Your opponent appears to be...a train!? Here it comes!
TEXT_DUNGEONOMEGA_00000_NERO_000_110<tab>(-Nero-)Ah, what a splendid atelier! Look around you, hero. Plenty of things in which to dip that brush!
TEXT_DUNGEONOMEGA_00000_CID_000_120<tab>(-Cid-)The Guardian will transition between a host of different combat programs. Try to keep track of which does what!
TEXT_DUNGEONOMEGA_00000_CEFCA_000_129<tab>I wield the greatest power in existence!
TEXT_DUNGEONOMEGA_00000_CEFCA_000_130<tab>You may as well be the dirt on the bottom of my boots! Or the dirt stuck to the bottom of that dirt!
TEXT_DUNGEONOMEGA_00000_CEFCA_000_131<tab>I will destroy everything! I will create a monument to non-existence!
TEXT_DUNGEONOMEGA_00000_CEFCA_000_132<tab>I lost!? How can I lose!? I just can't believe it!
